page.title: 06A Day in Bilson Infant Sch'
page.content:
On Monday at 9 o'clock when Mrs Oaten does the register we do our news.After this we do our pink book. In these we write about our families. In our white book we do things like writing down who sits next to each other. After we have done our white book we line up for prayers and then we sing a hymn. Miss Drewett asks if anybody has got a birthday. We give them 6 little claps if they are 6 years old. We go out to play at quarter to 11. After play we do our Fletcher book, we do things like sharing, adding and taking away. At 12 o'clock we have our dinner. After dinner we make our model wigwams and canoe for our Indian project. At half past 2 we go out to play. After play we tidy up and then Mrs Oaten reads us a story.
By Bilson Children.
